markdownRemark.html:
Lie(s)

People lie
Everybody lie
Parent lie
Others lie
Even myself lie

I hate people
I hate everybody
I hate you
I even hate myself
For being lied to

So what are living for?
Is life really worth living?

Life for Live a Li(f)e
